docs.lead_paragraph: 'DEAR SIR," wrote the artist. "What gives a critic, the worshiper of nothing, the right to in dulge in embarrassingly insolent obliquities, to pour out his malchosen verbiage on your Page?

headline.main: DEAR READER; Sort of an Apologia, To Be Dated 1964 Worse and Worse Fair Returns First Job Therefore

docs.abstract: Canaday, citing readers' lrs attacking him for adverse revs, defends critic's functions
docs.snippet: 'DEAR SIR," wrote the artist. "What gives a critic, the worshiper of nothing, the right to in  dulge in embarrassingly insolent obliquities, to pour out his malchosen verbiage on your Page?
